content.p: The School of Law continues to attract diverse and motivated students who engage with and enhance our rich intellectual and social life. We prioritise the welfare and experience of our students whilst studying at the School of Law. Current students have access to a range of resources and services to support them through their university life. The student intranet is an internal site for students to access useful information such as the school handbook, support resource, timetables, placements etc. Remember to also check our Moodle site for helpful information. You will need to use your university login. Law and Social Sciences building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
